function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex architectural shapes requiring higher budgets","Impact":"May cause chaos and disorder in the building, making residents feel uncomfortable and unpleasant","Mitigation":"Careful financial planning and cost-effective design strategies to optimize resources","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM) for cost estimation and value engineering","People":"Architects, designers, and building owners","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building owners"},{"Description":"Inevitable human error in mimicking nature may cause an unbalanced system","Impact":"May endanger the larger ecosystem","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and evaluation to ensure balance and sustainability in the built environment","Technologies":"Simulation tools for ecological impact assessment and ecosystem modeling","People":"Environmental scientists, architects, and engineers","Owner":"Environmental organizations, architects, and engineers"},{"Description":"Disputes exist between unprocessed, crafted, and synthetic natural materials","Impact":"May lead to uncertainty and conflict in material choice and design","Mitigation":"Comprehensive material research and analysis to understand the implications of each material choice","Technologies":"Material analysis software and virtual prototyping tools for material performance evaluation","People":"Architects, designers, and material scientists","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building owners"}]}
